name: Recipe: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup.

value.text: Recipe: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup

value.name: Lotus Head
value.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

value.name: Bird Egg
value.desc: An incredibly versatile ingredient that can supply all of your daily protein needs.

value.name: Sugar
value.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

value.name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
value.desc: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.

value.name: Yun Jin
value.desc: A renowned Liyue opera singer who is skilled in both playwriting and singing. Her style is one-of-a-kind, exquisite and delicate, much like the person herself.

value.name: Cloud-Shrouded Jade
value.desc: Yun Jin's specialty. This sweet and sticky snack will somehow not affect your throat in any negative way, which is why it's Yun Jin's favorite. The aftertaste is most elegant, not something one would get sick of quickly. Come to think of it... This is quite a decent bit more than she would usually make for herself â€” but who are you to question her kindness?

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Herbalist Gui at Bubu Pharmacy</color>
